newsitem.title: USA: ARCO Chemical names Fernandes as chairman.
newsitem.headline: ARCO Chemical names Fernandes as chairman.

text.p: ARCO Chemical Co said on Wednesday that Executive Vice President Anthony Fernandes had been elected as chairman of its board of directors.
Fernandes, an ARCO Chemical board member since 1996, replaces Mike Bowlin, chairman and chief executive of ARCO.
In a statement, ARCO Chemical said Fernandes, 52, has responsibility for all of its downstream operations, including ARCO Products Co and ARCO Global Energy Ventures.
ARCO Chemical Co manufactures propylene oxide and derivatives, and other intermediate chemicals.
